author: wn.com
title: Judgment of the Court of Justice in Case C-167/14 (CURIA - European Court of Justice) ...
text: ( Source : CURIA - European Court of Justice ) Because of its delay in implementing the directive on urban waste water treatment, Greece is ordered to pay a fixed sum of € 10 million and a periodic fine of €3.64 million per semester of delay
